Typealiases.html#/s:14JSQCoreDataKit22Pe.name: PersistentStoreOptions

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: name
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The name of the Core Data model resource.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: storeType
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The type of the Core Data persistent store for the model.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: storeURL
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The file URL specifying the full path to the store.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: modelURL
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The file URL specifying the model file in the bundle specified by bundle.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: databaseFileName
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The database file name for the store.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: migrate()
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: Progressively migrates the persistent store of the CoreDataModel based on mapping models found in the model’s bundle.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: mainContext
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The main managed object context for the stack, which operates on the main queue.
